title: 226: Tips to Reduce Brain Fog & Mental Fatigue with Dr. Steven Gundry
description:
How do you overcome and fix the mental fatigue that holds you back?
 
We’re excited to have Dr. Steven Gundry back on our show. Dr. Gundry is a distinguished cardiothoracic surgeon and is a pioneer in nutrition. He’s written multiple New York Times best-selling books, including The Plant Paradox and The Longevity Paradox.

In his brand-new book, The Energy Paradox, Dr. Gundry walks you through how you can regain your energy by understanding how your body creates energy and learning how to eat to maximize that process.

In our previous show with Dr. Gundry, we talked about understanding how the body creates energy and how to reset that process. Be sure to listen to that one if you've missed it.

And in this conversation, we’re going to go into more detail, focusing on some actionable Kwik Tips to tackle reducing brain fog and mental fatigue. Listen in as Dr. Gundry goes into more detail.
